EmailTemplate.name: 2014 Fundraising notification (temp)
EmailTemplate.subject: Update on your NCS fundraising
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
NCS POWERED BY THE CHALLENGE
You can now fundraise for Wigan and Leigh People First online
Dear Wave 3,
Hope your fundraising for Wigan and Leigh People First is going well! You can now fundraise online through this link.
You will be doing a sponsored 'Strong Man' event in September to raise money for Wigan and Leigh People First, so share this link with your friends and family from now on to get the donations rolling in!
Best wishes,
The Challenge
The Challenge Network Ltd is registered in England and Wales, no 6845451. Registered charity no. 1129239. Â© The Challenge Network.
You are receiving this email because you opted to subscribe for communications from The Challenge.
